attributes.action: Stop PWC/Management companies being paid tax payers money by local authorities
attributes.background: Pricewaterhouse Coopers and other Management companies are being paid by local authorities with UK tax payers money for fees for 'service contracts' There is no transparency within the contracts, Put the money back into frontline services instead of being paid to these companies to make profit !

rejection.details: The decision of whether or not to contract management companies is the responsibility of local councils, not the UK Government or Parliament.
